API Diff Specification
To Version: Android SDK 0.9_r1
From Version: Android SDK m5-rc14
Generated 2008.08.14 15:44
Statistics

Package android.telephony

Removed Classes and Interfaces
DataStateIntentReceiver A IntentReceiver implementation that provides data connection state over phone.
IPhone Interface for SDK developers to use to control the phone.
IPhone.Stub Local-side IPC implementation stub class.
PhoneStateIntentReceiver A IntentReceiver implementation that provides phone state and operation information.
ServiceState.State The servcie state enums of phone.
TelephoneNumberUtil Formatter for international telephone numbers.
TelephoneNumberUtil.Flags Flags which modify the default phone number presentation IDD is the International Direct Dial code, "011" in the US NDD is the National Direct Dial code, "1" in the US
TelephonyProperties Contains a list of string constants used to get or set telephone properties in the system.
 

Added Classes
CellLocation Abstract class that represents the location of the device.
PhoneNumberFormattingTextWatcher Watches an TextView and if a phone number is entered will format it using PhoneNumberUtils.formatNumber(Editable, int)
PhoneStateListener Class used to listen for changes in the phone state, including the service state, signal strength, message waiting (voicemail) indicator, etc.
TelephonyManager Access the state of the phone radio.
 

Changed Classes
PhoneNumberUtils Various utilities for dealing with phone number strings.
ServiceState Contains phone state and service related information.
